description: Send the trap of the operating logging information
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZXR10-LOG-MIB::zxr10LogMsgNotification ZXR10-LOG-MIB::zxr10LogClass i 1 ZXR10-LOG-MIB::zxr10LogLevel i 1 ZXR10-LOG-MIB::zxr10LogMsgText s EXAMPLE ZXR10-LOG-MIB::zxr10LogTimeStamp u 9999

description: The text of the message. If the text of the message
exceeds 255 bytes, the message will be truncated to
254 bytes and a '*' character will be appended -
indicating that the message has been truncated.
variables.name: ZXR10-LOG-MIB::zxr10LogMsgText

description: The time stamp of the message.
variables.name: ZXR10-LOG-MIB::zxr10LogTimeStamp
